data.description: vertices, edges, faces of common polyhedra
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
It's of benefit to mathematics, is compatible with other modules in
    Math::* namespace (such as Math::VectorReal), and other modules of
    similar complexity are in Math::*. It's the most obvious name for
    searching. A previous email to modules@perl.org gave no negative
    feedback.

    I didn't want to try to develop some rich taxonomy underneath
    Math::Geometry::foo::bar, of which this module would be alone. The
    Math::Geometry namespace seems too deep for a straightforward
    data-sourcing module like this.
